turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about a very urgent matter concerning your Social Security benefits. We believe there might have been some unauthorized activity on your account. Can you please tell me your full name and date of birth to verify your identity? We need to act fast on this, Grandpa.

II don't think we've met before, young man. This isn't my grandson's voice. Hold on a moment, let me check with Susan if she knows who's calling. 
(Susan enters the room)
Susan, is there someone supposed to be calling about our Social Security benefits? It sounds important though.
Calls like this seem to happen often these days, Walter. I'll take over since you're unsure. Let's not give out any personal information just yet. Can you hold on a moment while we figure this out?
Oh dear, it might be best if you hang up for now and let us call the official Social Security Office directly later today after we talk to someone who can help clarify what's going on. Something doesn't feel right here.
